targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartDate)*1000 as StartDate, 'ðŸš— Drive' as Action,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) as MinuteDiff,
    Start_address, End_address,
    TP1.odometer as odometer,
    consumption_kWh *-1 as kWh,
    km_diff, (StartRange - EndRange) * -1 as RangeDiff,
    TP1.battery_level as SOC, TP2.battery_level-TP1.battery_level as SOC_Diff,
    outside_temp_avg
from trip
	left outer join pos as TP1 on trip.StartPosId = TP1.id
    left outer Join pos as TP2 on trip.EndPosId = TP2.id
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(trip.StartDate) and km_diff < 1000 and trip.CarID = $Car 

union
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chargingstate.StartDate)*1000 as StartDate, 'ðŸ”‹ Charging' as Action,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) as MinuteDiff,
    pos.address as Start_address, '' as End_address, 
    pos.odometer as odometer,
    charging_End.charge_energy_added as kWh, 
    null as km_diff,
    charging_End.ideal_battery_range_km - charging.ideal_battery_range_km as RangeDiff, 
    charging.battery_level as SOC, charging_End.battery_level - charging.battery_level as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg
FROM charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
    pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
    charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
    join cars on cars.id = chargingstate.carid
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car 
union
SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T1.EndDate) * 1000 as StartDate, 'ðŸ…¿ï¸ Parking' as Action,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, T1.EndDate, T2.StartDate) as MinuteDiff,
    TP1.address as Start_address, '' as End_address,
    TP1.odometer as odometer,
    (TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - (TP2.ideal_battery_range_km + (TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer))) * wh_tr * -1 as kWh, null as km_diff,
    (TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - (TP2.ideal_battery_range_km + (TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer))) * -1 as RangeDiff,
    TP1.battery_level as SOC, TP2.battery_level-TP1.battery_level as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg
FROM
    drivestate as T1
    left outer join drivestate as T2 on T1.id + 1 = T2.id
    left outer Join pos as TP1 on T1.EndPos = TP1.id
    left outer join pos as TP2 on T2.StartPos = TP2.id
    JOIN cars ON cars.id = T2.CarID
where
    $__timeFilter(T1.EndDate) and T1.carid=$Car 
    and TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - TP2.ideal_battery_range_km >= 0
    and TP2.carid=$Car 
    and TP1.carid=$Car 
union

SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T2.StartDate) * 1000 - 1 as StartDate,
    'â“ Missing' as Action,
    null as MinuteDiff,
    TP1.address as Start_address, TP2.address as End_address,
    TP1.odometer as odometer,
    null as kWh, TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer as km_diff,
    null as RangeDiff,
    null as SOC, null as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg
FROM
    drivestate as T1
    left outer join drivestate as T2 on T1.id + 1 = T2.id
    left outer Join pos as TP1 on T1.EndPos = TP1.id
    left outer join pos as TP2 on T2.StartPos = TP2.id
where
    $__timeFilter(T1.EndDate) and T1.carid=$Car 
    and TP2.carid=$Car 
    and TP1.carid=$Car 
    and TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer > 0.5
    
    union

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartDate)*1000 as StartDate, 
	'ðŸ’¾ Update' as Action,
    null as MinuteDiff,
    version as Start_address, null End_address,
    null as odometer,
    null as kWh,     null as km_diff, 
	null as RangeDiff,
    null as SOC, null as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg
from car_version
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StartDate) and CarID = $Car 
    
    
order by StartDate desc

list.definition: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
list.name: Car
list.query: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
